abstract: Daisuke Matsui (松井 大輔, Matsui Daisuke, 11 May 1981 in Yamashina Ward, Kyoto City) is a Japanese footballer currently playing for Júbilo Iwata. He has previously played for Kyoto Purple Sanga, Le Mans FC, AS Saint-Etienne, FC Tom Tomsk, Dijon, Slavia Sofia and Lechia Gdańsk.His wife is a Japanese actress Rosa Kato.
